comments.body: Deliberate? Or commented out by mistake?

Deliberate. 
I didn't want to accidentally forget to type the parties when I demoed.

The Anyone is currently a hardcoded hack.
Will reinstate it when a central registration mechanism for players is implemented in the DAML.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +71,75 @@        return $ Query ShowOpenState
    ["offer"] ->
        Nothing -- return $ Submit Local.OfferNewGameToAnyone
    "offer":ps -> do
        return $ Submit $ Local.OfferGameL (map Player ps)
